quote: Banks should pay a small tax on all their transactions!
We should have an EU military!
We need to make CO2 pollutors pay more!
We should protect more asylum seekers!
The minimum salary salary should be the same across Europe!
Telecom providers should not be allowed to track and store my data!
It's unthinkable that European countries borrow money together!
We should build railways instead of highways!
We should continue to help the poorest countries in the world!
We need to guarantee the right to abortion!
